tool_description: Meet Lemurbot - Your Personal AI Chatbot Companion! With advanced features like creating, training and chatting, Lemurbot makes it easy and fun for users to interact and learn from an intelligent conversationalist. Plus, with ChatGPT integration and the ability to create multiple bots, the possibilities for learning and entertainment are endless!
name: LemurBot
title: LemurBot

api_list.name: Get A Category Group
api_list.description:
Get a specific category group by it's id and view it's details.
You are able to view your own category groups and locked category groups.
'Locked' category groups are a master set of records available to link to your bots

id.description: The id of the category group

slug.description: This is a unique string used to identify the category group - this is automatically generated

name.description: The name of the category group

description.description: The description of the categories contained in this group

locked.description: Locked category groups cannot be editted by users but they can be linked to bots

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

api_list.name: Get A Category
api_list.description: Get a specific category by it's id and view it's details

category_group_id.description: The id of the category group

pattern.description: The category pattern is used to match the client input message

topic.description: Topics can be set and the category will only be triggered if the category topic is matched to current topic

that.description: This is the previous response returned by the bot. Only use the 'that' field to add context.

template.description: Templates are parsed to generated bot responses. Categories use the AIML stamdard.

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

api_list.name: Get A Bot Property
api_list.description: Get a specific bot property by it's id and view it's details

id.description: The id of the bot property

name.description: The field name of the bot property

value.description: The value of the bot property

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

api_list.name: List All Bot Properties
api_list.description: Get a list of bot properties that belong to bots created by the user (not locked bots).

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the bot property

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: bot_id
optional_parameters.description: bot_id of the bot property

optional_parameters.name: bot
optional_parameters.description: Bot slug of the bot

optional_parameters.name: value
optional_parameters.description: Value of the bot propery - this will perform a partial search

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the bot propery

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

id.description: The id of the bot property

name.description: The field name of the bot property

value.description: The value of the bot property

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

api_list.name: List All Bots
api_list.description:
Get a list of bots that are available to this user.
These will either be bots created by the user or 'locked' public bots which can be chatted to but not editted. (e.g. 1)

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: Slug of the bot (e.g. dilly)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: locked
optional_parameters.description: search for bots which are locked or bots which are not locked (e.g. false)

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Title of the bot (e.g. Dilly)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Perform a partial search on the description of the bot (e.g. demo bot)

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of Bot

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

slug.description: This is a unique string used to identify the bot

title.description: This is the title of the bot (the bot's actual name is set in the bot properties)

default_response.description: If everything fails then this is the default response the bot will return

image.description: A url of the avatar used for this bot (we only use images from api.dicebear.com). If a image isnt specified one will be created automatically

locked.description: Locked bots are example bots that anyone can talk to but you cannot update, delete or access logs

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: Get A Bot
api_list.description: Get a specific bot by its id. (e.g. 1)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lemurbot.p.rapidapi.com/bots/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lemurbot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lemurbot.p.rapidapi.com/bots/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lemurbot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

slug.description: This is a unique string used to identify the bot

title.description: This is the title of the bot (the bot's actual name is set in the bot properties)

default_response.description: If everything fails then this is the default response the bot will return

image.description: A url of the avatar used for this bot (we only use images from api.dicebear.com). If a image isnt specified one will be created automatically

locked.description: Locked bots are example bots that anyone can talk to but you cannot update, delete or access logs

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

api_list.name: List All Category Groups
api_list.description:
Categories are organised into category groups. For example if you have a set of categories to handle questions on the weather these could be grouped into a category group called 'weather-categories'.
You are able to view your own category groups and locked category groups.
'Locked' category groups are a master set of records available to link to your bots

optional_parameters.name: locked
optional_parameters.description: Locked category groups can be linked to bot so that you can access their knowledge categories but you cannot cannot update, delete or access this group or it's categories

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: the description of the category group - this search is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the name of the category group - this search is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: the slug of the category group - this search is an exact search

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the category group

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

id.description: The id of the category group

slug.description: This is a unique string used to identify the category group - this is automatically generated

name.description: The name of the category group

description.description: The description of the categories contained in this group

locked.description: Locked category groups cannot be editted by users but they can be linked to bots

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: List All Clients
api_list.description:
Clients talk to bots. This return a list of all clients that have spoken your bots. Clients can talk to your bots or the locked bots.
'Locked' bots are a set of public bots available to link to your clients in addition to bots you create.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: The slug of the client

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the client

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: is_banned
optional_parameters.description: The banned status of this client

slug.description: This is a string used to identify the client - if one is not created by the user then it is automatically generated - we suggest generating your own uuid

is_banned.description: Prevent further conversations between this client and the bot by setting is_banned to true

image.description: The image is automatically generated by getting a url from api.dicebear.com. The avatar selected correspnds to the one chosen for the linked bot

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: List All Categories
api_list.description:
Categories are pieces of knowledge used by the bots to respond to the user.
Create and update categories inorder to teach and train your bot.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: category_group_id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the category group

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: topic
optional_parameters.description: The active topic of the conversation - this search is a full term search

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: that
optional_parameters.description: The that is the previous bot output/response to match on - this search is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: template
optional_parameters.description: The template is the raw output that is parsed and used to generate a response - this search is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: pattern
optional_parameters.description: The pattern is the user input to match on - this search is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the category

category_group_id.description: The id of the category group

pattern.description: The category pattern is used to match the client input message

topic.description: Topics can be set and the category will only be triggered if the category topic is matched to current topic

that.description: This is the previous response returned by the bot. Only use the 'that' field to add context.

template.description: Templates are parsed to generated bot responses. Categories use the AIML stamdard.

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: Get A Conversation
api_list.description: Get a specific conversation by it's id and view it's details

api_list.name: List All Conversations
api_list.description:
Conversations are created between clients and bots.
Users can only view conversations between their clients and bots.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

optional_parameters.name: bot
optional_parameters.description: The bot slug of the conversation - conversation are linked to bots

optional_parameters.name: client
optional_parameters.description: The client slug of the conversation - conversation are linked to clients

optional_parameters.name: bot_id
optional_parameters.description: The bot_id of the conversation - conversation are linked to bots

optional_parameters.name: client_id
optional_parameters.description: The client_id of the conversation - conversation are linked to clients

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: The slug of the conversation

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the conversation

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

turn_count.description: The number of turns in this conversation

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: List All Conversation Turns
api_list.description:
Each conversation has conversation turns.
Each turn represents an input from the client and the output from the bot.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return

optional_parameters.name: conversation
optional_parameters.description: The slug of the conversation - conversation are linked to conversation turns

optional_parameters.name: conversation_id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the conversation - conversation are linked to conversation turns

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: input
optional_parameters.description: What was said to the bot by the client - this is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: What was said by the bot in response to the client input - this is a partial search

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the conversation turn

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: the search field you wish to order by - the available field names are the sames ones you can search by

id.description: The id of the conversation turn

created_at.description: The date time the record was created

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

records.description: The number of records returned in the request

total.description: The total number of records available

limit.description: The number of records to return

api_list.name: Get A Conversation Turn
api_list.description: Get a specific conversation turn by it's id and view it's details

id.description: The id of the conversation turn

updated_at.description: The date time the record was last updated

api_list.name: Get Chat Detail
api_list.description:
Get the details for an active chat session.
Send a bot slug and client slug as query parameters and the request will return the details from the last active chat session.

slug.description: The unique string id of the conversation
The unique string id of the bot

name.description: The name of the bot (taken from the bot properties and if not available then the bot title)

slug.description: The unique string id of the client

api_list.name: Get Chat Log
api_list.description:
Get the logs for an active chat session.
Send a bot slug and client slug as query parameters and the request will return the logs from the last active chat session.

optional_parameters.name: dir
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the ordering

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page number of results to start from

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: the number of records to return
